name: Aniballz!
description:
Cut the rope to make your cute pets fall to the next firefly attachment point and be careful not to touch the bramble branch on your way.

Every time you break a box you will rescue a new pet and he will follow you!
If you rescue 3 pets in a row, you will unlock the crazy rescue frenzy!

One-tap easy-to-learn controls with stunning visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics.
